cz.cuni.mff.kocur.considerations

Class Consideration

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.considerations.Consideration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsiderActive, ConsiderCooldown, ConsiderCreepHealth, ConsiderDistanceToTarget, ConsiderGameTime, ConsiderGoldYield, ConsiderInventorySpace, ConsiderItemPresent, ConsiderMoney, ConsiderProjectileSpeed, ConsiderSecretShop, ConsiderSourceHealth, ConsiderSourceMana, ConsiderTargetHealth, ConsiderTargetValue, ConsiderThreat, ConsiderTimePassed

    public abstract class Consideration
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that represents a basic Consideration. Considerations have parameteres, that can be stored inside them. Each of the considerations scores input value the scores are then used by decisions to calculate their scores. To work with scores we introduce methods clamp(..) and normalize(..). Clap clamps the values to 0-1 interval. Normalize uses min and max to normalize the values to 0-1 interval.
    Author:
    kocur

      • doubleParameters

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> doubleParameters
        Double parameters, that user might need. For example PARAM_RANGE_MAX, that can be used by scoring functions to get the maximum range a value can have. And to normalize it.

      • integerParameters

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> integerParameters
        Integer parameter, that might be useful to considerations. For example type of inventory we are considering (stash, backpack ..)

      • stringParameters

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> stringParameters
        String parameters, that the considerations might need. For example name of item that should be bought/sold. Inventory slot etc.

      • readableName

        protected java.lang.String readableName
        Readable name of this consideration.

      • utilityFunction

        protected UtilityFunction utilityFunction
        Utility function of this consideration. Parameters and its type are stored inside.

      • parentDecision

        protected Decision parentDecision
        Parent decision of this consideration. We might want to retrieve for example time of last execution from it.

      • score

        private double score
        Score of last computation.

      • normalizedInput

        private double normalizedInput
        Normalized input of last computation.
